original_title: Hardcore: A Poke Into the Adult Film Orifice
overview: Linda Boreman's documentary 'Hardcore: A Poke into the Adult Film Orifice' chronicles the x-rated exploits of novice filmmaker Jack Innov as he gathers a cast and crew to produce his lavish sex epic 'Assanova'.
tagline: The hardcore film industry laid bare and exposed from every angle!
title: Hardcore: A Poke Into the Adult Film Orifice
